usage: Content moderation schedules and safety review timelines

dataMapping.title: Content Safety Review Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Content moderation and brand safety assessment schedule
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary safety objective (e.g., 'Achieve 95% brand safety compliance across all placements')

phases.primaryLabel: Safety phase (e.g., 'Initial Assessment', 'Deep Content Review', 'Compliance Verification')
phases.description: Phase safety objectives and review scope
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected safety outcomes and compliance levels

milestones.milestoneLabel: Safety milestone (e.g., 'Publisher Audit Complete', 'Safety Score Achieved')

dependencies: Safety dependencies (e.g., 'Publisher list finalized', 'Safety criteria defined')

successMetrics: Safety success metrics (e.g., '95% brand safety compliance', 'Zero brand risk incidents')
riskFactors: Safety risks (e.g., 'Content policy changes', 'New publisher risks', 'Contextual misalignment')
